overview:
A fast-track, highly motivated, team and results oriented business entrepreneur and business executive.

More than fifteen years experience across various industries, business functions and cultures. Recognized for exceptional ability on delivering business results and effectively motivating others at all levels in the achievement of individual and organizational goals.

Experience in successfully launching and growing startups in the technology and outsourcing industry plus consultancy including strategic and business process analysis, design and implementation, change management and HR capacity building
